title: Riemann Hypothesis
description: Prove that every non-trivial zero of ζ(s) has real part 1/2.

title: P vs NP Problem
description: Determine whether every problem in NP can be solved in polynomial time.

title: Navier–Stokes Existence & Smoothness
description: Prove global existence and smoothness (or finite-time blow-up) in 3-D for incompressible Navier–Stokes.
